metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12761 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: modules/loaders/loader_ico.c in imlib2 1.6.0 has an integer overflow (with resultant invalid memory allocations and out-of-bounds reads) via an icon with many colors in its color map.

notes.Note: leosilva> introduced in later so old releases aren't affected

criterions.comment: imlib2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
